name: FUCKHEAD
description: "FUCKHEAD" is an experimental video game in which you play as an exploded-head man who wanders surreal black and white landscapes in a search for Clonazepam (an anti anxiety suppressant) all the while trying to find moments of clarity. This game can be seen as an interlude between sexual frustration and boredom, a netherworld burdened by the pounding weight of anxiety. It is more or less an interactive continuation of the voyeuristic Supersexhibition video that I created in 2015 (the video can be seen here: https://vimeo.com/134059426).
